amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to procure any Army Aircrew Combat Uniforms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to procure any Army Aircrew Combat Uniforms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 51 - 378 (Roll no. 352).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 51 - 378 (Roll no. 352).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Gosar.
